item.title: Black Inscription
item.description: As the science of climate change has painted an increasingly dire picture of the near future, the importance of environmental communication has become a hot topic in the environmental movement. While the main takeaways of climate science and the reality of global warming caused by human activities are all but entirely settled, people often arenâ€™t able to fully internalize what this means on a personal level. Visuals projected during the recent performance of Black Inscription Matthias Bossi and Carla Kihlstedt during rehursals In Woods Hole, a center of oceanographic studies, a local musical and multimedia performance called Black Inscription took on the challenge of communicating these tough scientific lessons.
